entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle mixed with snow changing to snow near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
